com.orientechnologies.common.log

Enum OAnsiCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<OAnsiCode>
      • com.orientechnologies.common.log.OAnsiCode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<OAnsiCode>

    public enum OAnsiCode
extends Enum<OAnsiCode>
    Console ANSI utility class that supports most of the ANSI amenities.
    Author:
    Luca Garulli
